subject: Football (College)
Sugar Bowl
Rose Bowl (Football Game)
lead_paragraph: Perhaps because of an N.C.A.A. rule that a conference must have 12 teams to stage a championship game, the Big 12 is the only one of the Big 5 conferences not to earn a berth in the inaugural College Football Playoff.
snippet: Perhaps because of an N.C.A.A. rule that a conference must have 12 teams to stage a championship game, the Big 12 is the only one of the Big 5 conferences not to earn a berth in the inaugural College Football Playoff.
